name: Agent Of Chaos (itch)
description:
This is my submission to the Brackeys GameJam 2021.2.

You play as Kapasura, a vicious beast who has to escape a volcanic prison which is built like a maze. He meets the god of chaos, a fire serpent, and strikes a deal with him to help Kapasura out.

Its a 2D platformer with the main mechanic being a snake which can be used as a weapon as well as a grapple.

Playing in FullScreen is recommended

Thankyou to all the organizers for giving me this wonderful opportunity :D
